name: 3dGenPriors
author: AFNI Developers
description: Produces classification priors based on voxel signatures.

inputs.description: Signatures dataset. A dataset with F features per voxel.
inputs.name: Signatures dataset

inputs.description: Training results. This file is generated by 3dSignatures.
inputs.name: Training results

inputs.description: Prefix for class dataset
inputs.name: Class prefix

inputs.description: Prefix for probability dataset
inputs.name: Probability prefix

inputs.description: Labeltable to attach to output dataset
inputs.name: Labeltable

inputs.description: Specify the output that this program should create.
inputs.name: Output type

inputs.description: Specify root prefix for output volumes.
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Provide cmask expression. Voxels where expression is 0 are excluded from computations.
inputs.name: Cmask expression

inputs.description: Provide mask dataset
inputs.name: Mask dataset

inputs.description: Consider MASK only for values between M0 and M1, inclusive.
inputs.name: Mask range

inputs.description: Set debug level
inputs.name: Debug level

inputs.description: 1D index or 3D indices (I J K) of voxel to debug.
inputs.name: Voxel debug

inputs.description: File in which debug information is output
inputs.name: Voxel debug file

inputs.description: User identifier string. Used to generate names for temporary files.
inputs.name: User ID

inputs.description: Use temporary storage to speed up the program
inputs.name: Use temporary storage

inputs.description: Do not use temporary storage
inputs.name: Do not use temporary storage

inputs.description: Reuse probability output from an earlier run.
inputs.name: Probability set

inputs.description: Reuse classification output from an earlier run.
inputs.name: Classification set

inputs.description: Regroup classes into parent classes. Requires naming the original classes as C1.*, C2.*, etc.
inputs.name: Regroup classes

inputs.description: Classify into these classes only.
inputs.name: Classes

inputs.description: Use these features only. Otherwise, all features in the signature file will be used.
inputs.name: Features

inputs.description: Use strict feature name matching.
inputs.name: Strict feature match

inputs.description: Feature groups.
inputs.name: Feature groups

inputs.description: Show information obtained from the training data about the distribution of DIST. Set DIST to ALL to see all distributions.
inputs.name: Show distribution

inputs.description: Use OpenMPized routines for faster performance.
inputs.name: Fast

inputs.description: Do not use OpenMPized routines.
inputs.name: Slow
